column5: What do you guys think of the curado hg for jerkbaits? will it hold enough line? (14lb fluoro) or should i get a bigger reel?

http://www.tackletour.com/previewshimanocurado70.html  The TT review mentions filling around 70yds of 14lb fluoro. The will prob also depend what line you use since each manufacuturer varies their line diameter.

The 70 size should be fine with your 14lb you should get a little over 200' on that reel. I use the Aldebaran 50HG for jerk bait's and use 10lb fluorocarbon on that setup. I make long casts and still have more than half the spool full. (Reaction FC Fluoro)
